TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter

Docs.summary: 定义用于编写 的方法和属性。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>方法，以获取<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>添加的编写器<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>内容到<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail AddThumbnail(valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType imageType) cil managed
Public Function AddThumbnail (imageType As XpsImageType) As XpsThumbnail

block.para: 只有一个缩略图可以表示作为一个整体文档序列 （尽管单独的文档和页可以有其自己的缩略图图像）。 如果引发时，将调用已有一个缩略图。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: 刷新并关闭 编写器。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A>方法以刷新并关闭<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>编写器。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Printing::PrintTicket ^ PrintTicket { void set(System::Printing::PrintTicket ^ value); };

Docs.summary: 为正在编写的 设置 。
Docs.value: 一个 ，表示序列的默认打印配置。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 设置此属性不会验证或修改指定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>为特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。 如果需要使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>，无效对指定的打印机。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A>相关联属性<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>与<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]
